website_summaries.verdict: A good-quality cast iron fajita pan set with a wooden base and handle holder.
pros: This pan comes pre-seasoned and the pan itself is high-quality, made of heavy-duty cast iron
It distributes and retains heat well, keeping food hot from oven or grill to table
cons: The wooden base is not as high-quality as the pan itself, and some users received broken bases or had their bases break after light use

customer_reviews.title: Read about measurement for pan size
customer_reviews.text: I thought the pan size was going to be 15",but they measured the overall size with handle, who cares how long the handle is, it's the pan size that's important. I sent this item back
customer_reviews.author: HoneyLaura

customer_reviews.title: pour quality
customer_reviews.text: ordered 2 plate set, they showed up with a handle out each side of the torn box, the wooden boards logo was mostly rubbed off, i thought was they were used, the plates also had rust marks in them, my first thought was to toss them in the garbage can, i don't write reviews very often, but this one got to me
customer_reviews.author: Bdub

customer_reviews.title: Too small for family
customer_reviews.text: The skillet was too small. The 15.5” measurements included the handle, actual cooking area was 8.5” Much too small for my family. It would be nice for an individual serving but I would need to buy 6 of them for my family. I returned it. Quickly refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Gorillaman74

customer_reviews.title: Product if OK!
customer_reviews.text: Product is OK, and one was delivered with a broken handle! The cloth handle cover is too thin (hot on hands), and the wood is cheap, and some were already cracked and must have been repaired by company! wood also warps after a couple of weeks of use! You get what you pay for! GM / Restaurant
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Clay Lord

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! I love mountains so I didn’t notice the wood underneath had mountain decor on it. It looks exactly how the picture shows it. Very durable. Recommend this to anyone who is looking!
customer_reviews.author: Annich

customer_reviews.title: ok product
customer_reviews.text: Does Not heat up that much, hard to clean after one use it sall rusty
customer_reviews.author: Aashma Dalal

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. It didn’t have the mit with it and it said it’s 15.25 inches it’s not even 15 inches if you measure from the far tip of the handle. Total lie. Garbage!
customer_reviews.author: PAUL M FOUQUIER

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of 4 of these for the family. Everything is great with the product, except for one small detail that isn't really a big deal.. The wood bases have a shellac coating that melts off on the bottom of the pan when it's hot. Not a huge problem, but well worth a comment. Other than that, money well spent and I'm completely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great little cast iron pan!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for grilled onions, garlic, veggies and meats. Perfect size. Also use for flaming cheese...Opa!!! I love that the sides are low and easy to access food plus the ability to easily flip your cooked items.
customer_reviews.author: Bandit

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I love fajitas and was sick and tired of paying a fortune for some chicken and veggies. What I can make at home ! I This is such a hit. I bought a few over the years and now I have fajita night with family and friends ! That means rice//beans//guac//salsa//quesO//pico.. marsgaritas... it ends up being a fiesta ole ole!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Too small to serve dishes with.
customer_reviews.text: Too small to fit a good size of steak with potato. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Mills

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: First of all it’s very small. Under side rusted and It’s very hard to clean surface.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 4 and one of them arrived with the handle broken off. Cast iron is not easily broken so this just shows the cheap materials these are made from.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A

customer_reviews.title: All as expected except mitt was not in PKG
customer_reviews.text: Handle mitt was not in PKG. Otherwise all is good
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: its not safe to use on the table My customer burns fingers few time so I dump them
customer_reviews.author: Lipon

customer_reviews.title: No Mitt ...
customer_reviews.text: Received with no Mitt.. it looks nice but no mitt.
customer_reviews.author: maria evans

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on a weekly basis and my goodness.. this gives you the satisfaction of the real sizzling plate! Beef, pork, chicken and all make it sizzling!!!! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Linsangan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Just need to put wipe down with Coconut oil once done looks new still
customer_reviews.author: Trendy shopper ATC

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Using on my grill to cook lobster cut in half lengthwise with white wine, butter and garlic!
customer_reviews.author: Flyboy555

customer_reviews.title: Great little pan not only for veggies and fajitas but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little pan not only for veggies and fajitas but for grilling small steaks plus comes with it's own trivet
customer_reviews.author: Sam Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: WISH I HAD BOUGHT A LARGER ONE, BUT DOES THE JOB
customer_reviews.author: M L DAVENPORT

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my fajita pan! The only thing was is that I ordered two and one came without the hot mitt. Other than that great product. I will probably order more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality, I buy a pair of the Brand Tramontine and was much better fabrication
customer_reviews.author: vamack

customer_reviews.title: Used product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible condition. Has rust all over it. Looks used. Didn’t come with handle cover. Dissappointed and due to pandemic unable to go out for returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: holds heat to keep food warm.
customer_reviews.text: Great. Serves my purpose to keep my elderly father from sawing through or breaking regular or plastic plates. The pan is placed directly on the stove and his steak is cooked in it. Heated pan keeps his food warm until he reaches the table.
customer_reviews.author: addie

customer_reviews.title: Love ‘em!
customer_reviews.text: Initially bought one...now have set of four. I hate it when food gets cold before I’m finished eating. I use these almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: codythepig

customer_reviews.title: Fajita plate
customer_reviews.text: I use these for all types of meals. Just be careful to heat to appropriate temp for food being served so it doesn't continue to cook.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: This it great! It is my pan for cooking and my ...
customer_reviews.text: This it great! It is my pan for cooking and my plate for eating. Food stays hot/warm while i eat.
customer_reviews.author: Roger L Cauble

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy and thought it might be to small for nightly meals. But it is a perfect size, easy to care for and wishes I had ordered it earlier. Food stays warm throughout the meal.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: I love this small helper.
customer_reviews.text: My stove is rather small so I was looking for a small plate to cook some special dishes I enjoy. The fact that I like iron pots and pans, and the size of this one, makes me happy. Thank you, Amazon, one more time!
customer_reviews.author: C. Tablante

customer_reviews.title: Good product and fast deivery!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. Looks nice but will have to see how it does on cooking. Fast delivery and so far pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Used item.
customer_reviews.text: Product looked used as the plate was cracked and looks as though someone tried to glue it. Pan was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Used several times with no problem. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't sit flush on base
customer_reviews.text: The skillet doesn't rest well on the base. It sits awkwardly and for something thats going to be scalding hot, it's a little unsettling.
customer_reviews.author: Custominor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but the wood is very low quality. Burns so fast after few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Fox

customer_reviews.title: So many uses for this Fajita Plate
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her family love to camp and use these Fajita plates for so many different things from individual breakfast meals to grilled sandwiches, to Fajitas and more! They use a lot of iron skillets and know the importance of taking good care of iron cookware. The warmer pad is very helpful too.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: use in my outdoor broiler to serve a great steak every time
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since my wife cooks a lot. This is what she wanted. It is a great size. The chicken tasted great after the great cooking.
customer_reviews.author: temeculatim

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine what more I could have expected
customer_reviews.text: I guess some have experienced problem with the wood cracking....we've used it 4 or 5 times now, and haven't had that problem. For what we paid for these (from memory, it was less than $20), they were a bargain. Heck, even if they fall apart after a year, who cares? The fajitas were great...and the mitt covering the handle is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Libertarian Nationalist

customer_reviews.title: I like the design specially comes with the wood placed
customer_reviews.text: The size is a little bit smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Huitz

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging and broke.
customer_reviews.text: The skillet arrived in a box with board and mitt all laying apart and not even wrapped up. There wasn't any packaging inside to protect it and the board was split in half. I was shocked at this as all the reviews I had read before purchasing this item said the seller was great. I guess in the hurry of Christmas someone had to suffer.
customer_reviews.author: allyonzo

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned the Fajita Pans so obviously, I'm not the expert, but I love these pains. I have made desserts, breakfasts, Mexican dishes and I am very satisfied. I only ordered 2 and we are a family of 4 so I will probably be ordering a few more.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cable

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. I ended up buying a 12" cast iron skillet also. They are both awesome
customer_reviews.author: C. Lordan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken! The wooden base in two pieces when ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken! The wooden base in two pieces when unpackaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun little pan. What a treat.
customer_reviews.text: I love using this pan. It started more of a "meh" purchase to get free shipping, but turned out to be quite a gem. Love getting it blazing hot and sizzling various meats and veggies for fajitas. Foods taste amazing! Problem is this is basically 1-person size. (crowding the pan for 2 cools it down really quick but can be done) Need multiple pans when people come over. Guess I'll have to get another. Oh, only con: the wood plate has totally curved and warped. I think I set the hot iron plate on it when the wood was wet. Still works though. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - except that the handle holders are extremely thin.
customer_reviews.author: R N.

customer_reviews.title: Fajita Plate Set
customer_reviews.text: It is okay, don't use it everyday, but ok , not al all unhappy with the purchase. was a bit pricy
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Good pan Bad tray
customer_reviews.text: Just as other reviewers reported, I received my two pans and trays, and one tray was broken. The pans are great but the trays are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Freed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Grillers
customer_reviews.text: These kept food sizzling hot right through the meal. Just throw the cast iron on the grill while everything else is cooking. Easy to clean with a nylon brush and hot water...DONT USE SOAP! The only minor downside was the wooden trays can scratch the table. I lightly sanded mine and use placemats to avoid any marring.
customer_reviews.author: reggierussell

customer_reviews.title: one wooden holder was broken
customer_reviews.text: i chose this rating because it got here on time...it was packaged well...and it was EXACTLY what i ordered...except for the one broken wooden platter that i fixed...GREAT JOB! :)
customer_reviews.author: Teri Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Fajita Plates
customer_reviews.text: Just love my new Fajita Plate set. will use then every chance I get, love the would suggest to my friends, Thanks you. Dawn
customer_reviews.author: dawn oneil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, exactly what I expected. When the temperature reachs, fry the meat and place the onions and peppers, stir a bit and ready. The sound, when he takes the plate to the table, the full flavor of the fajita. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre R. C. Mendonca

customer_reviews.title: thaey are really nice.
customer_reviews.text: My son and his wife were thrilled with them, but I noticed one of the planks had a separation between the pieces of wood that were glued together to make the plank. It will break in half if dropped I am sure. Other than that, thaey are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Drozdowski

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets and we love them. One will serve two people easily, but we like having our dish our way :)
customer_reviews.author: T. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Just used this once and it rusted. I scrubbed ...
customer_reviews.text: Just used this once and it rusted. I scrubbed it then put oil but when i used it again tasted rust. I saw a nicer one at kroger for only $6 with a thick wooden tray.
customer_reviews.author: bright girl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The cast iron skillets are fine. The wooden plates underneath have a picture burned into the bottom side. The varnish (?) on that was sticky. After leaving them upside down for several days they seem to have dried out. Hopefully they won't stick to the table or placemat when the hot skillet is on top! Very prompt delivery!!
customer_reviews.author: Grammyp

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: We have not used it and it already has rusts. Has to be treated first before using or else it will be a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Abby C

customer_reviews.title: The pan rusts very easily. Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: The pan rusts very easily. Hard to clean. Other than that, it's the perfect size for a quick meal for one.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Comes out rust.
customer_reviews.text: When i washed it , hum~ have very strong iron smell and comes out rust. I need it for holiday dinners , when i use it with wrap because of rust though. i dont like this. Cleaning is hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Fajita Plate Set - Pre-seasoned Cast Iron Fajita Pan with Wooden Tray and Hot Mitt by Old Mountain
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1| Size:15.25 InchThis Old Mountain Cast Iron Fajita Plate Set comes complete with wood tray and quilted hot mitt. The cast iron fajita plate is pre seasoned and ready to use. The wood tray has an attractive Old Mountain logo wood burned into the bottom for extra style and added value.
feature_bullets: Pre Seasoned and Ready to Use
Old Mountain logo is burned into back of wood tray
Retains heat better than other cookware

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars243 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
